channel.title: Need help with DELTA dialogue
channel.description:
I'm having troubles with DELTA dialogues When I want to make an npcs say more than one case it only gives one.
this is my code: [code]case 134: talk2("Hello, Welcome to Fantasy World","To start playing u have to complete the tutorial.",945); break;
case 135: talk2("U can start by heading through the door over there and","talk with the survival lady",945); break; [/code]
Can anyone help me so when u click the npcs he first says case 134 and then 135 and not only 135 like now thanks

item.title: Need help with DELTA dialogue
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

I’m having troubles with DELTA dialogues
When I want to make an npcs say more than one case
it only gives one.

this is my code:

[code]case 134:
talk2(“Hello, Welcome to Fantasy World”,“To start playing u have to complete the tutorial.”,945);
break;

		case 135:
			talk2("U can start by heading through the door over there and","talk with the survival lady",945);
		break;

[/code]

Can anyone help me so when u click the npcs he first says case 134 and then 135
and not only 135 like now
thanks

Read full topic
